title: Sheriff's deputy dies after off-duty shooting
content:
A St. Mary Parish Sheriff's deputy has died as the result of an off-duty incident, according to media reports.
Deputy Jason Hagen died Friday after a shooting in Franklin, KATC has reported.
Hagen, 24, had been a corrections officer at the St. Mary Parish Law Enforcement Center since February 2015.
Troopers say the shooting happened around 10 p.m. Thursday. State Police are investigating the shooting.
